TableListSQL.value: Select table_name From information_schema.tables Where table_name Like 'GiGL[_]Spp[_]%' And table_name Not Like 'GiGL[_]Spp[_]%[_]%' Order By table_name

SelectTypeOptions.value: Spatial Only;Survey Tags Only;Spatial and Survey Tags

ConfidentialClause.value: R6SURVEY <> 'Battersea Park - Birds' AND R6SURVEY <> 'Battersea Park Nature Reserve'

Columns.Value: SPP_NAME, LATIN_NAME, RECORD_TAXON_CLASS, TAXONOMIC_GROUP, DATE_START, DATE_END, DATE_RANGE, RECORDYEAR, RECORDER, DETERMINER, VERIFICATION, GRIDREF, EASTINGS, NORTHINGS, GRPRECISION, QUALIFIER, COMMENTS, BREEDING_STATUS, STATUS_PLANNING, STATUS_OTHER, STATUS_LISI, CONFIDENTIAL, SENSITIVE, SORTORDER, R6SURVEY, RECORDERID_TOCC, SP_GEOMETRY

WhereClause.Value: RECORDYEAR >= 1985 AND (NEG_RECORD <> 'Y' OR NEG_RECORD IS NULL) AND GRPRECISION <= 100 AND GRIDREF IS NOT NULL AND DATE_START IS NOT NULL AND RECORDER IS NOT NULL AND LATIN_NAME <> 'Homo sapiens' AND VERIFICATION <> 'Considered incorrect'

Columns.Value: SPP_NAME, LATIN_NAME, RECORD_TAXON_CLASS, TAXONOMIC_GROUP, DATE_START, DATE_END, DATE_RANGE, RECORDYEAR, RECORDER, DETERMINER, VERIFICATION, GRIDREF, EASTINGS, NORTHINGS, GRPRECISION, QUALIFIER, COMMENTS, BREEDING_STATUS, STATUS_PLANNING, STATUS_OTHER, STATUS_LISI, CONFIDENTIAL, SENSITIVE, SORTORDER, R6SURVEY, RECORDERID_TOCC, SP_GEOMETRY

WhereClause.Value: (NEG_RECORD <> 'Y' OR NEG_RECORD IS NULL) AND GRPRECISION <= 100 AND (STATUS_PLANNING IS NOT NULL OR STATUS_OTHER IS NOT NULL) AND GRIDREF IS NOT NULL AND DATE_START IS NOT NULL AND RECORDER IS NOT NULL AND LATIN_NAME <> 'Homo sapiens' AND VERIFICATION <> 'Considered incorrect'

Columns.Value: SPP_NAME, LATIN_NAME, RECORD_TAXON_CLASS, TAXONOMIC_GROUP, DATE_START, DATE_END, DATE_RANGE, RECORDYEAR, RECORDER, DETERMINER, VERIFICATION, GRIDREF, EASTINGS, NORTHINGS, GRPRECISION, QUALIFIER, COMMENTS, BREEDING_STATUS, STATUS_PLANNING, STATUS_OTHER, STATUS_LISI, CONFIDENTIAL, SENSITIVE, SORTORDER, R6SURVEY, RECORDERID_TOCC, SP_GEOMETRY

WhereClause.Value: (NEG_RECORD <> 'Y' OR NEG_RECORD IS NULL) AND GRPRECISION <= 100 AND STATUS_LISI IS NOT NULL AND GRIDREF IS NOT NULL AND DATE_START IS NOT NULL AND RECORDER IS NOT NULL AND LATIN_NAME <> 'Homo sapiens' AND VERIFICATION <> 'Considered incorrect'

Columns.Value: SPP_NAME, LATIN_NAME, RECORD_TAXON_CLASS, TAXONOMIC_GROUP, DATE_START, DATE_END, DATE_RANGE, RECORDYEAR, RECORDER, DETERMINER, VERIFICATION, GRIDREF, EASTINGS, NORTHINGS, GRPRECISION, QUALIFIER, COMMENTS, BREEDING_STATUS, STATUS_PLANNING, STATUS_OTHER, STATUS_LISI, CONFIDENTIAL, SENSITIVE, SORTORDER, R6SURVEY, RECORDERID_TOCC, SP_GEOMETRY

WhereClause.Value: (NEG_RECORD <> 'Y' OR NEG_RECORD IS NULL) AND GRPRECISION <= 100 AND TAXONOMIC_GROUP = 'bird' AND GRIDREF IS NOT NULL AND RECORDER IS NOT NULL AND VERIFICATION <> 'Considered incorrect'

Columns.Value: SPP_NAME, LATIN_NAME, RECORD_TAXON_CLASS, TAXONOMIC_GROUP, DATE_START, DATE_END, DATE_RANGE, RECORDYEAR, RECORDER, DETERMINER, VERIFICATION, GRIDREF, EASTINGS, NORTHINGS, GRPRECISION, QUALIFIER, COMMENTS, BREEDING_STATUS, STATUS_PLANNING, STATUS_OTHER, STATUS_LISI, CONFIDENTIAL, SENSITIVE, SORTORDER, R6SURVEY, RECORDERID_TOCC, SP_GEOMETRY

WhereClause.Value: NEG_RECORD = 'Y' AND GRPRECISION <= 100 AND GRIDREF IS NOT NULL AND DATE_START IS NOT NULL AND RECORDER IS NOT NULL AND LATIN_NAME <> 'Homo sapiens' AND VERIFICATION <> 'Considered incorrect'

WhereClause.Value: GRPRECISION >100 AND GRIDREF IS NOT NULL AND DATE_START IS NOT NULL AND RECORDER IS NOT NULL AND LATIN_NAME <> 'Homo sapiens' AND VERIFICATION <> 'Considered incorrect'
